title: Reward?1
body: Atleast give us something a reward for helping lol some people work so hard finding bugs reporting it i think we deserve a little bit of creddit riot{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Alpha Testers will be getting a summoner icon. Just letting you know that they heard your voice. 

Logging in the alpha client before November 15th 2016... is all that is required to receive this reward.

We talked about this 6 months ago, if you were around that you would know we don't get anything as it would be unfair to those who started testing 6 months ago to those who started a week ago. Besides everyone will switch eventually. If you want a reward just wait and be grateful.
